subject: p16662264
Findings: Heart size remains enlarged. Hilar contours are unchanged. Endotracheal tube, upper enteric tube and left PICC remain in unchanged position. Widespread multifocal parenchymal opacities remain unchanged from immediate prior study. Subtle lobulated lucencies in the right mid lung are suggestive of pneumatoceles. Left-sided pleural effusion is improved. There is no pneumothorax.
Impression: Multifocal lung infection persists, with possible pneumatoceles, but with some improvement of left pleural effusion. If clinical improvement is uncertain, CT may be helpful to document changes.
